title: Stay Hydrated During Summer
shortDescription: Drink at least 8 glasses of water daily to stay healthy and avoid dehydration.
author: Dr. Nushrat Jahan

title: Proper Hand Washing
shortDescription: Always wash your hands for 20 seconds with soap to prevent infections.
author: Dr. Arman Hossain

title: Mental Health Matters
shortDescription: Practice meditation and sleep 7-8 hours a night for emotional balance.
author: Dr. Sadiya Alam
